mapper.select: SELECT A.LEAVE_RETURN_ID , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.EMPLOYEE_ID , A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID FROM LEAVE_RETURN A WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } ORDER BY A.LEAVE_RETURN_ID DESC LIMIT #{ elementsPerPage } OFFSET #{ offset }
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM LEAVE_RETURN A WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId }
